column4: Does anybody know why a monitor would blink (black screen) after Xorg starts up? But if I turn off and back on the monitor, it fixes the problem?
Normal as in it's switching from metacity to compiz.
like, it won't stop happening until you turn your monitor off then back on?
Hmmm.  That sounds like a possible resolution problem.  Is it CRT or LCD?
Not sure then.  Nvidia or ATI?
Not sure about intel cards.  I know nVidia and ATI work fine though.  Never had a problem with them.  Could be a funky driver.
That's what I was thinking too.
How old is the graphics card?
Huh?  My disks mount automatically in livecd.
